channel.title: Semantic Web on Cong Peng
channel.description: Recent content in Semantic Web on Cong Peng

item.title: Linkedinfo.co
item.description: The Web should be an open web. All the informations published on the Web are meant to be shared, share through links by search engines, rss, social networks, etc. This site is yet another method that tries to link all the informations (but starts with only technical articles on LinkedInfo) and share them. The original idea of this side project is to utilize Semantic Web technologies to link the informations. Noble ambition shall start from basic, it needs to be improved little by little.

item.title: An Ontological Approach to Integrate Health Resources from Different Categories of Services
